# Code of conduct

* A member of the R Community is:
* Open
+Members of the community are open to collaboration, whether it's on projects, working groups, packages, problems, or otherwise.

*Considerate
+Members of the community are considerate of their peers - other R users.

*Respectful
+Members of the community are respectful.
